subject: Fenway Park (Boston)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox tribute to George Steinbrenner, which also saluted Bob Sheppard, the Yankees’ public address announcer for more than half a century, created some unusual theater at Fenway Park.
snippet: The Red Sox tribute to George Steinbrenner, which also saluted Bob Sheppard, the Yankees’ public address announcer for more than half a century, created some unusual theater at Fenway Park.
